      • returnAllSubmittedDocuments

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doc/allsubmitted/{username}")
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> returnAllSubmittedDocuments(@PathVariable(value="username")

                                                                                                                                                                                      PagingData pagingData)

        username - of specific user
        pagingData - to set number of items, sorting order and search phrase
        Returns:
